recommendations.title: Migrate to Free Tier for DynamoDB
recommendations.description: DynamoDB offers a free tier for new tables with up to 25 read capacity units and 25 write capacity units. Migrating to this free tier can save 20% of the current cost.
steps: Create a new DynamoDB table with free tier settings
Migrate existing data to the new table
Update application code to use the new table

recommendations.title: Optimize EC2 Instance Types
recommendations.description: EC2 instance types can be optimized to reduce costs. For example, downgrading from a t2.micro to a t2.nano instance can save 20% of the current cost.
steps: Identify underutilized EC2 instances
Downgrade instance types to t2.nano
Monitor and adjust instance types as needed

recommendations.title: Use Open-Source Alternative for CloudWatch
recommendations.description: CloudWatch can be replaced with an open-source alternative like Prometheus. This can save 20% of the current cost.
steps: Install and configure Prometheus
Migrate existing CloudWatch metrics to Prometheus
Update application code to use Prometheus

recommendations.title: Migrate to Cost-Effective Storage for S3
recommendations.description: S3 storage can be optimized to reduce costs. For example, using S3 Standard-IA instead of S3 Standard can save 20% of the current cost.
steps: Identify infrequently accessed S3 objects
Migrate objects to S3 Standard-IA
Monitor and adjust storage settings as needed

recommendations.title: Use Multi-Cloud Provider for CloudFront
recommendations.description: CloudFront can be replaced with a multi-cloud provider like Cloudflare. This can save 20% of the current cost.
steps: Configure Cloudflare as a CDN
Migrate existing CloudFront distributions to Cloudflare
Update application code to use Cloudflare

recommendations.title: Right-Size Lambda Function Instances
recommendations.description: Lambda function instances can be right-sized to reduce costs. For example, downgrading from a 128MB instance to a 64MB instance can save 20% of the current cost.
steps: Identify underutilized Lambda functions
Downgrade function instances to 64MB
Monitor and adjust instance sizes as needed

recommendations.title: Use Free Tier for RDS
recommendations.description: RDS offers a free tier for new instances with up to 750 hours of usage. Migrating to this free tier can save 20% of the current cost.
steps: Create a new RDS instance with free tier settings
Migrate existing data to the new instance
Update application code to use the new instance

recommendations.title: Optimize CloudFront Distribution Settings
recommendations.description: CloudFront distribution settings can be optimized to reduce costs. For example, enabling compression and caching can save 20% of the current cost.
steps: Enable compression and caching on CloudFront distributions
Monitor and adjust distribution settings as needed
Update application code to use optimized distributions
